p: Flavone and flavonol have many biological activities, including antioxidant, anti-HIV, anti-cancer, and anti-inflammatory [ 34, 35, 36]. In this study, a total of 46 flavones and 49 flavonols were detected. There were a large number of differential metabolites when GP petals were compared with other samples. Moreover, baicalin, apgenin, scutellarin, and narirutin displayed were present at higher levels in GP petals than in the other samples, which was consistent with the total flavonoid content of GP petals ( Figure 2). Interestingly, a series of derivatives of quercetin in GP petals was present at higher levels when compared with the other three Chaenomeles species. Quercetin is one of the most abundant flavonoids [ 37], and numerous studies have found that it has many biological activities, including neuroprotection, antioxidant, and anticancer [ 38, 39, 40].
